Members.name: ChangeTimeZone
Members.remarks: To get a list of all the available TimeZones, check the method.

example.para: The following example shows how to convert a DateTime object between different time zones.
The following example shows how to convert UTC DateTime to a specific time zone.
example.code: // Convert the UTC current DateTime to Brasília time zone. DateTime brasiliaDateTime = DateTime.UtcNow.ChangeTimeZone(TimeZoneInfo.Utc.Id, "E. South America Standard Time");
